Description:
They thought that they were able to escape from death. They were wrong. Aboard the ship where survivors have taken refuge after the bloody horrors of the island Bana, there was a new outbreak of a mysterious epidemic. In a desperate search for salvation boys and girls left the doomed ship. But they still do not know that in a strange shore them already waiting countless hordes of the walking dead, hungry for human flesh! Continued exciting open-world action will please fans of completely new locations, weapons, and unique methods of combat with hordes of bloodthirsty zombies. It is a familiar team joined the fifth character - John Morgan, who prefers hand to hand combat. Together with them, you have to find a safe hiding place and explore the jungle-covered island Palanai waterlogged. Use the boats to reach the farthest corners of the land. Create unique weapons and defenses. Survive at all costs and look for survivors - that's a task that you have to face and it will not be easy. Hope is drowning in blood.
